questions.quote: Oh, yes I am. Mr. Thomassoulo likes to play dirty. Well, there's nothing dirtier than a giant ball of oil.
Hey, I'm sorry, I- you know, I, I thought you knew.  You got any meat?
It's hell. It's the financial equivalent of a complete rectal examination. I would have killed this man. Torn him limb from limb, ripped the flesh right off his bones ...
What's the matter with you? Are you crazy? Why are you using my name?!
And the indigent, yeah.. I, I do volunteer work for them. I-I set the whole thing up, and I got Jerry to do it.
Nah, I got it from a guy on the street. It was, like, fifty bucks.
Well. See ya later, Elaine. Feldman an' I 'a' gotta get down 'o the library.
You know, I didn't go to the bathroom the entire time we were in India.
I thought I told you about it, yes, she teaches political science? I met her the night I did the show in Lansing...
You don't try to. You do it! Fifty-one percent of all turns are right turns. You know that? 'Try to.'
